script:
1). Which floor is the lunchroom on?
I just ate.
The third. 
At noon.
2). How often do we get paychecks?
$600 a week.
Twice a month. 
They're in our mailboxes.
3). Where can I find a drinking fountain?
Around the corner, next to the elevator. 
No thank you. I don't drink.
Yes, I have a fountain pen.
